San Francisco, CA - Senior Data Center Linux Administrator - www.clustrix.com

Clustrix has a sophisticated automation infrastructure that supports development, performance, and quality efforts for the ClustrixDB scale-out SQL database. We are currently looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to help us maintain our business-critical data center and offices IT infrastructure, including hundreds of machines deployed at our colocation facility and in the cloud.

For more info or to apply, see http://www.clustrix.com/company/careers/
